application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: See map neighbouring gardenT1 - Leyland Cypress x 1 (X Cupressocyparis leylandii) - Trim over garden to containT2 - Pittosporum x 1 (Pittosporum tenuifolium tobira) - Remove large low limb over hanging garden.See mapT3 - Holly x1	(Ilex aquifolium) - Reduce in height by approx. 6m - Trim to shape.Rear of tennis courtT7 - Laurel x 1 (Prunus spp) - Remove large main stem.Rear of tennis courtT8 - Holly x 1 (Ilex aquifolium)	 - Trim face back from tennis courtSee mapT9 - Olive x 2 (Olea europaea) These trees have outgrown their location - Reduce in height by approx. 3m to suitable growth points - Reduce/trim laterally to shape.See mapT10 - California Lilac x 1 (Ceanothus spp)	This tree is in poor condition - Fell to ground level - Grind down stump 300mm below ground level/dig out roots.See mapT11 - Purple leaf Plum x 1 (Prunus cerasifera 'Nigra') - Remove lower limb.- Selectively prune to balance.See mapT12 - Apple x 1 - Remove low limb over net - Cut back from net by 0.5m.Along fence see mapT13 - Apple x 1 - Reduce all round by approx. 1m to suitable growth points.See map right sideT14 - Laburnum x 1 (Laburnum anagyroides) Including saplings and 1 mature tree - Reduce in height by approx. 1-2mSee map right sideT15 - Dogwood x 1(Cornus Spp) - reduce all round back to previous reduction points approx. 1-2mFront garden see mapT16 - Purple leaf Plum x 2 (Prunus cerasifera 'Nigra') To shape and contain - Reduce all round by 1-2m to suitable growth points.Front garden see mapT17 - Pear x 1(Pyrus communis) - Reduce in height by approx. 2-3m - Reduce laterally to shape.
